messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] best place to blog?
messages.msgSnippet: ... Which is the same thing as Blogspot. It s backed by Google. They ve just started implementing categories on some blogs so it s getting even better. Joyce
messages.messageBody:
> I've found Blogger.com to be easy to work with.

Which is the same thing as Blogspot. It's backed by Google.

They've just started implementing categories on some blogs so it's
getting even better.

Joyce

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] best place to blog?
messages.msgSnippet: Blogger.com is super easy! That s what I use and I didn t know anything about blogging until I started there, and it s been a piece of cake.  They walk you
messages.messageBody:
Blogger.com is super easy!
That's what I use and I didn't know anything about blogging until I started
there, and it's been a piece of cake. They walk you through everything, and
it's very exciting the first time you push that PUBLISH button!
Good luck!

karen

http://thewildtribe.blogspot.com

messages.messageBody:

Renee

Facing a mirror you see merely your own countenance; facing your child you
finally understand how everyone else has seen you.
~Daniel Raeburn, The New Yorker, 05-01-2006

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] best place to blog?
messages.msgSnippet: ... I ve found Blogger.com to be easy to work with. They have templates all set up that you can use by just filling in the blanks. Pretty simple. -- ~Mary
messages.messageBody:
>>Since so many of you blog, could you recommend an easy site to start on? >>

I've found Blogger.com to be easy to work with. They have templates all set up that you can use by just filling in the blanks. Pretty simple.

--
~Mary
http://zenmommasgarden.blogspot.com/

"The miracle is not to walk on water. The miracle is to walk on the
green earth, dwelling deeply in the present moment and feeling truly
alive."
~Thich Nhat Hanh

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] best place to blog?
messages.msgSnippet: I m at blogspot.com, as are most of the folks I know locally who have blogs.  It s free, easy to set up and now that I ve learned to upload my pix one at a
messages.messageBody:
I'm at blogspot.com, as are most of the folks I know locally who have blogs. It's free, easy to set up and now that I've learned to upload my pix one at a time, it's very easy to format text & photos on my blog.

Sylvia

www.ourhapahome.blogspot.com
